attributes.action: Remove all Speed camaras from public roads!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Speed camaras are not nessasary in this day and age to many times have people been issused points for doing 33/34 in a 30 and slaped with a fine and points on their licences which pushes up our insurance premiums they are an eye saw and are not nessasary

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
